import React from 'react'; import style from './NavBar.module.css' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import List from '@material-ui/core/List'; import ListItem from '@material-ui/core/ListItem'; import ListItemIcon from '@material-ui/core/ListItemIcon'; import ListItemText from '@material-ui/core/ListItemText'; import InboxIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Inbox'; import {Announcement, Message, MusicNote, People, Settings} from '@material-ui/icons'; type NavBarProps = { isShowNavBarMenu?: (isShow: boolean) => void } type RefType = HTMLProps const NavBar = React.forwardRef((props: NavBarProps, ref) => { return (
props.isShowNavBarMenu && props.isShowNavBarMenu(false)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}> isActive ? style.active : style.item)}>
); }) export default NavBar;
